name: GLOW (itch) (charcoalx)
description:
As someone lost in the between space between memory and reality, play as a spirit trying to lighten up remnants of their life on earth. Different coloured fireflies reveal clues of who you once were (although this is still to be implemented). Currently you can grab fireflies and place them in the lantern to light up the scene. Chill in this beautiful space! This game can be played on VR.

Music: Haezer
Art Direction: Charcoal
Development and handtracking: Ross Borchers

This game is dedicated to my aunt who suffers from early onset amnesia, and a colleague we lost too soon.
